Name: jainms
Title: Water sports
Review: this water sport is good and neatly maintained the water quality, day outing with food and games enjoyed a lot.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Kids love to dance in rain and mini slide
Review: It's an awesome place for those who love to dance in the rain and music. Wonderful music. Kids really love the mini slides as it is lot of fun. My kid didn't want to come out of the shower and kept on sliding. It's small and safe for kids. Overall its a great experience for kids ðŸ§’

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: enjoyable
Review: Its enjoyable over here with DJ and rain dance that is available.Mini slides to enjoy for kids and adults.We have outdoor games as well to play and provision to play indoor games as well

Name: idea614354
Title: musty time
Review: a best time spending time for kids in holidays they will enjoy water rides and mechanical rides. pools also available.

Name: mail2mathews96
Title: Leo Splash
Review: Leo Splash nice place to enjoy the waterpark if we book in group we get in good discounted rate the park is well maintained as well good to enjoy

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Good place to hand out
Review: The place is neat and clean and I along with my colleagues had a wonderful time by splashing out in water all the time.

Name: TADAKAMADLA A
Title: Good Picnic Spot
Review: Leonia is very good place for weekend enjoyment with friends and family. The pool in the resort is very big and maintained neatly.

Name: Sukanya D
Title: Nice water park.
Review: An awesome place for a group of people. The water park is well maintained. There are few rides. I went there wid my colleagues and enjoyed a lot.

Name: Prasad
Title: Enjoyed the place
Review: We have gone to leonia resorts on a Business trip. The place was clean and good. For parties and functions it is a good place. Pool side and gaming movies night parties everything is good here.Enjoyed a lot with coligues.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Well Maintained
Review: Best place for water sports. Pool is well maintained and high end resort. Not much crowded as well...

Name: renu_73
Title: A high end boutique resort.
Review: Went there with the kids for the weekend.It is a high end resort with some exciting stuff for the young crowd.Has a few pools so is not overcrowded.Excellent food,a restaurant with tables in the water where you feet are immersed in water a little above the ankle where you enjoy a peaceful dinner.The crowd is majorly those who come to spend the day, so the evenings are not very crowded and is peaceful.

Name: Sisdahl
Title: Nice, and not crowded
Review: Fair price, clean service and food, and orderly conduct, not like the overcrowded other parks.Remember sunscreen, not availeble.

Name: BharatKumarKondru
Title: Well maintained swimming pool
Review: Very well maintained swimming pool with fun games. Very helpful staff. Well organised activities for kids.

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Family Fun
Review: Went to this place over the weekend to stay at Leonia resort and take a fun bath at the Leo splash. Good for family on a sunny day.

Name: sainarani007
Title: Visit to Lenonia
Review: It is an excellent place to spend and enjoy with family.The Swimming pool is very big and comfortable.It is perfect pool for family. We really had a great time with my family and children.Children enjoyed water slides.If i get time, I will visit again with my family to this perfect atmosphere.

Name: PSRENTERPRISES
Title: lot of enjoyment
Review: nice place to visit.and gameing,movies restarents and viewing is very good.good service provided very good

Name: Sravan Vadde
Title: nice resort
Review: it was drizzling through the day when i was there. the pool is big and it was fun as not many people were there. there were two water slides. other activities were not that fun as the grounds were wet. the lunch buffet was okay with a decent spread.

Name: Anil
Title: not as much as expected though chill n enjoy
Review: well the place is very big spread across entire area with a multiplex in . some water sports , slides but doesn't add charm to it , but interior and maintenance of flora fauna is good and complete good resort to relax . few slides and a swimming pool with rain dance. it was my first visit but it don't charm me . still you can go for it and enjoy with friends

Name: akant k
Title: fun place
Review: Located inside the Leonia Holistic Destination in Hyderabad, Leo splash is one of India's most popular water theme parks. Assuring people oodles of fun and frolic, this water park attracts visitors from all corners of the state and beyond.

Name: Praveen K
Title: Good resort on outskirts of Hyderabad
Review: a good resort on teh outskirts of hyderabad. a place where a family can relax for a holiday for a day or 2. has entertainment for every age group. Kids love this place.

Name: seedhunter
Title: Good but bit pricy
Review: Located in the Leonia Resort, Leo space has many water sports and activities, which kids and adult both can enjoy. You have to spend >1000 for fetching swim costumes as it nit available on the rent. better to carry yours. maintenance needs to be addressed. Bit away from the city, approx. takes >1 hr drive from Hussainsagar lake.

Name: vijaykrishna1984
Title: good getaway for weekend in hyderabad
Review: Leonia is a very good resort close to Secunderabad . it would be around 40 min drive from Secunderabad. this is one of the best resorts in hyderabad . it has many day actives and lot of sport and games . they have good swimming pool and bars and restaurants . in the lagoon rooms they have private swimming pools and the food is very good . they have a small surfing pool which is fun to try . they even have a spa here . over all i would rate this place 5 of 5 . really like it . good place for a weekend getaway from the city .

Name: Bhushan Sabnis
Title: nice for a day trip
Review: couple of slides, rain dance and big pool... many other activities like bungee jumping for kids. Worth spending time with family and friends for a day!

Name: sanjay v
Title: Was best but turned to horrible
Review: This was the best resort with all amenities and water sports and pool. Management turned this all into a hell where now they just eat up money and never bother about guest's convenience. It was a favorite weekend gateway for corporate, family and other groups but because they are getting good numbers of incomers, services have gone worst now. Food which was really nice before 2013, has gone worst now. Nobody will tell you where to go and their outdoor games are always without gears. Overall this is once nice but now worst place. Management is still sleeping and they never care about you. The person you are dealing before visit may be switching his phone off when you visit. What the hell will you do then?????Visit on your risk

Name: chinna_79
Title: Not price worthy
Review: there will no to guide to tell where to go and what to do. charges 1300 bucks for no reason, we have to buy swim wear(no rental) for about 410+ bucks(extra), in order to get into the pool. if u really want swimming pool and water rides there are very good other places in hyderabad you can visit.

Name: Rajni A
Title: Best place to hang on on weekends
Review: I would be very proud to say that hyderabad is bestowed with so many places worth visit.From religious to historical , From fun to food.....I just love hyderabad. Leonia holistic destination is one of the resorts where one can enjoy a full weekend with their kids splashing in the basking waters.Exellent place..
